turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order an Iced Caffe Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what location are you wanting the drink from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The location at 4300 Ambassador Caffery PkwyLafayette, LA 70508

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size would you like the drink to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Tall size

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like in the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular milk is fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like to add any flavoring, whipped cream, or any other toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like whipped cream and chocolate syrup

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like to add any other items your order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be all. Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so to confirm your order. You have a Tall Iced Caffe Mocha with Whipped Cream, Chocolate Syrup, and regular milk. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, did you want me to go ahead and charge this to the account we have on file for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok your total is 5.89 and it'll be charged to your credit card associated with the account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your estimated time for pick-up is in 10 minutes. Is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your order will be ready for pick-up in ten minutes at the Ambassador Caffery location. Your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, great thank you, goodbye.
